title: The Innocents
description: Nothing ever came between sisters Alice and Charlie.Friends didn't.Boys couldn't.Their family falling apart never would.Until they got to Serenity Point.In a town built on secrets and lies, it's going to be hard to stay innocent.They're sucked into a strange and seductive worldâ€”a world they can't help but hate, and can't help but love. A world that threatens to tear them apart, just when they need each other the most. The Innocents is the first in a new series of young adult novels that weave a saga of nail-biting drama, breathless romance, and Gothic mystery.
author: Lili Peloquin
